mapper.sql: class_transaction_id, class_id, class_transaction_title, class_transaction_content, class_transaction_person, class_transaction_time, class_transaction_remark
mapper.select:
SELECT b.class_name, a.class_transaction_id, a.class_id, a.class_transaction_title, a.class_transaction_content, a.class_transaction_person, a.class_transaction_time, a.class_transaction_remark from class_transaction_info a,class_info b where a.class_id = b.class_id
and a.class_transaction_id = #{classTransactionId,jdbcType=INTEGER}

SELECT b.class_name, a.class_transaction_id, a.class_id, a.class_transaction_title, a.class_transaction_content, a.class_transaction_person, a.class_transaction_time, a.class_transaction_remark from class_transaction_info a,class_info b where a.class_id = b.class_id
and class_transaction_title=#{classTransactionTitle}
mapper.insert: insert into class_transaction_info (class_transaction_id, class_id, class_transaction_title, class_transaction_content, class_transaction_person, class_transaction_time, class_transaction_remark ) values (#{classTransactionId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{classId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{classTransactionTitle,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{classTransactionContent,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{classTransactionPerson,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{classTransactionTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{classTransactionRemark,jdbcType=VARCHAR} )
